Sentencas: In this paper, we report a study of the perovskite phases, BaFe0.6Co0.3Nb0.1O3-delta(BFCN) and BaCo0.7Yb0.2Bi0.1O3-delta(BCYB), as possible air electrode materials for solid oxide cells (SOCs).
Titulo: Understanding the effect of water transport on the thermal expansion properties of the perovskites BaFe0.6Co0.3Nb0.1O3-δand BaCo0.7Yb0.2Bi0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: The crystal structures and thermal and chemical expansion properties are reported, and the stability evaluated in different atmospheres.
Titulo: Understanding the effect of water transport on the thermal expansion properties of the perovskites BaFe0.6Co0.3Nb0.1O3-δand BaCo0.7Yb0.2Bi0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: The thermal expansion data show unusual behaviour, with apparent negative thermal expansion (NTE) behaviour at low temperatures (100-240 degrees C) up to - 11.6 x 10(-6) K(-1)for BFCN and up to - 17.3 x 10(-6)
Titulo: Understanding the effect of water transport on the thermal expansion properties of the perovskites BaFe0.6Co0.3Nb0.1O3-δand BaCo0.7Yb0.2Bi0.1O3-δ
Understanding the effect of water transport on the thermal expansion properties of the perovskites BaFe0.6Co0.3Nb0.1O3-δand BaCo0.7Yb0.2Bi0.1O3-δ
Understanding the effect of water transport on the thermal expansion properties of the perovskites BaFe0.6Co0.3Nb0.1O3-δand BaCo0.7Yb0.2Bi0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: This NTE behaviour is related to water incorporation at lower temperatures, which is then lost in this temperature range upon heating.
Titulo: Understanding the effect of water transport on the thermal expansion properties of the perovskites BaFe0.6Co0.3Nb0.1O3-δand BaCo0.7Yb0.2Bi0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: In order to examine the potential of these materials for use in a solid oxide electrolyser, the stability at elevated temperatures in the presence of water was evaluated, which indicated that water vapour leads to increased degradation at SOC operation temperatures.
Titulo: Understanding the effect of water transport on the thermal expansion properties of the perovskites BaFe0.6Co0.3Nb0.1O3-δand BaCo0.7Yb0.2Bi0.1O3-δ
